poem:
### Half a Century Beyond

spinning blades  
against a dawn sky—  
memory lifts,  
remnants of history's dust.  
Fifty years—  
yet stories cling  
like whispers  
in a forgotten wind,  
seeking truths  
beyond shadowed myths—  
a nation's echo,  
learning its own  
silent song.
